productionSqlExpression: SELECT SUM(onorder_value) as result FROM inventory_summary_by_dept WHERE department_name = 'Abrasives';
calculationType: Calculate the value of incoming assets for the given department.

productionSqlExpression: SELECT COUNT(order_no) AS result FROM oe_hdr;
calculationType: Enumerate all recorded transactions.

productionSqlExpression: SELECT COUNT(order_no) AS result FROM oe_hdr WHERE status = 'open' AND CAST(order_date AS DATE) = CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE);
calculationType: Count today's unfulfilled requests.

variableName: Key Metrics All Open Orders Overview
productionSqlExpression: SELECT COUNT(order_no) AS result FROM oe_hdr WHERE status = 'open';
calculationType: Count all pending unfulfilled requests.

productionSqlExpression: SELECT SUM(total_amount) AS result FROM invoice_hdr WHERE CAST(invoice_date AS DATE) = CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE);
calculationType: Aggregate today's total invoiced currency.

productionSqlExpression: SELECT SUM(total_amount) AS result FROM invoice_hdr WHERE status = 'open';
calculationType: Aggregate all unpaid invoiced currency.

productionSqlExpression: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT order_no) AS result FROM oe_line WHERE status = 'backordered';
calculationType: Count unique transactions with supply-chain delays.

variableName: Key Metrics Total Sales Monthly Overview
productionSqlExpression: SELECT SUM(total_amount) AS result FROM invoice_hdr WHERE invoice_date >= DATEADD(month, DATEDIFF(month, 0, GETDATE()), 0) AND invoice_date < DATEADD(month, DATEDIFF(month, 0, GETDATE()) + 1, 0);
calculationType: Aggregate current month's total invoiced currency.

productionSqlExpression: SELECT SUM(new_rentals_count) as result FROM rental_activity_monthly WHERE activity_month = Format(DateAdd('m', -11, Date()), 'mmm');
